newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil 1996 GDP growth seen at 2.91 pct - IBGE.
newsitem.headline: Brazil 1996 GDP growth seen at 2.91 pct - IBGE.

text.p: Brazilian gross domestic product (GDP) growth is seen at 2.91 percent for 1996, according to the National Statistics Institute (IBGE).
GDP per capita increased 1.52 percent in 1996, the IBGE said.

The IBGE said the figures reflected growth rates of 3.12 percent in agriculture and 3.34 percent in services, which displayed better performances than the industrial sector with a growth rate of 2.34 percent.
((--Simona de Logu, Rio de Janeiro newsroom, 5521 507 4151))
